welcome_message_body: "Welcome to beautiful Beamsville, Canada! Known for its picturesque vineyards and charming small-town feel, we invite you to immerse yourself in our local culture and explore all that our charming city has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at St Catharines Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at John C. Munroe Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at John C. Munroe Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Niagara Falls International Airport houses all ticketing, baggage claim, and security checkpoints.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A is a smaller terminal used primarily for regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
